attributes.action: Legalize Cannabis and Regulate/Control it...Take dealers of the streets....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With Cannabis scheming that it is becoming more popular within the UK,Why are you allowing the revenue for uncontrolled cannabis consumption to go to the underground market? Alcohol/Cigarettes are ALOT worse,but because its being socially accepted for years,people think its fine.

and PLEASE don't give us the same answer from all of the other petitions...

rejection.details: There are many similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=legalise+cannabis&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=eu+referendum&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
